subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Gary Sheffield’s pinch-hit, bases-empty blast tied the score in the seventh and the Mets defeated the Milwaukee Brewers after Luis Castillo sent a runner home in the bottom of the ninth.
snippet: Gary Sheffield’s pinch-hit, bases-empty blast tied the score in the seventh and the Mets defeated the Milwaukee Brewers after Luis Castillo sent a runner home in the bottom of the ninth.
